p: Biosurfactant production was carried out in 250 mL Erlenmeyer flasks with 100 mL of production medium containing lactose, CWW and CO, according to a full-factorial design (FFD) (“ Factorial design” section). The media were adjusted to pH 7.0 and autoclaved at 121 °C for 15 min. Then, they were inoculated at 1% and incubated for 72 h at 28 °C, under orbital agitation (150 rpm).
